summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CSV/JSON Export feature for Pro and Premium Analytics. All backend endpoints working correctly with proper tier-based access control. Frontend export UI fully functional with download triggers, loading states, and Premium-only feature gating.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/export/proposals returns correct JSON format with data, filename, record_count, content_type
Backend: GET /api/export/proposals returns correct CSV format with headers and data
Backend: GET /api/export/analytics returns correct data for Pro tier with status_breakdown, platform_breakdown, approval_rate
Backend: Export endpoints properly gate access - unauthenticated requests return 401
Backend: Export endpoints properly gate access - invalid tokens return 401
Backend: GET /api/export/full-report returns 403 for Pro tier (Premium only)
Backend: GET /api/export/revenue returns 403 for Pro tier (Premium only)
Backend: Date range filtering works (7d, 30d, 90d, 1y, all)
Frontend: Export buttons visible in Analytics tab for Pro tier user
Frontend: Export Proposals CSV button triggers download (proposals_export_*.csv)
Frontend: Export Proposals JSON button triggers download (proposals_export_*.json)
Frontend: Export Analytics CSV button triggers download (analytics_pro_*.csv)
Frontend: Export Analytics JSON button triggers download (analytics_pro_*.json)
Frontend: Full Report CSV/JSON buttons are correctly DISABLED for Pro tier
Frontend: Premium badge overlay visible on Full Report section
Frontend: Loading spinner appears during export request
critical_code_review_comments: Export service properly excludes MongoDB _id from responses
Tier-based access control correctly implemented in all export endpoints
Frontend handleExport function properly handles both JSON and CSV formats
data-testid attributes present on all export buttons for testing

success_rate.backend: 100% (11 passed, 2 skipped - free tier user tests)

seed_data_creation: None - used existing Pro tier creator
context_for_next_testing_agent: Export feature fully tested. Pro tier creator (protest@example.com) has 3 test proposals. Export endpoints: /api/export/proposals, /api/export/analytics (Pro+), /api/export/revenue, /api/export/full-report (Premium+). Frontend export UI in Analytics tab with data-testid attributes: export-proposals-csv, export-proposals-json, export-analytics-csv, export-analytics-json, export-full-csv, export-full-json.
